George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. programme.desc: The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! programme.title: Team Zenko Go

programme.desc: When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When the famous headless horse shows up in town, the San Lorenzans must turn to an unlikely hero to help save the day.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When a kind, gentle Demon with dreams of being evil emerges from the portal, Puss and the team do their best to teach the monster how to be bad

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: After meeting her riding idols, Pru vows to practice until she's perfect — even if it means missing out on a bonfire her best friends are planning.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: Abigail puts herself at risk to reunite an orphaned otter with his family. But the school veterinarian insists the animal will be safer at the zoo.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Branch must learn the importance of patience when Poppy teaches him "hair-jitsu"/Smidge tones down her forceful Smidge-ness when she forms a crush on the village critter-narian

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesn’t love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: When Sam Whippet asks Tag to help fill every seat in the Speedway for his big race, Tag zips around Pawston seeking out dogs. But it won’t be easy, as it happens to be a very busy day in town. A very distracted Beans makes Tag’s task even harder. / When pup-star Kelly Korgi announces a contest where she’ll pick her favorite Roadside Attraction to star in her new music video, Tag and Scooch are excited to enter Pawston. Now they just have to build one. And they have to do it fast.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Ari moves in to Harmony Harbor, but notices something strange involving a group of kids, a Noodle Truck chef and her pet squirrel. / After Ari discovers the secret of Team Zenko Go, he asks to join the crew. But first he must learn the importance of teamwork.

programme.title: World of Street Woman Fighter
programme.desc: The <Street Woman Fighter> series make a triumphant return on a global stage! 6 dance crews from different countries set to compete in an upgraded match to win the title of International Champion!

programme.title: GBRB: reap what you sow
programme.desc: Actors Lee Kwang-soo, Kim Woo-bin, Doh Kyung-soo and Kim Ki-bang, who are best friends in real life, experiencing and enjoying rural life in a remote ‘FARM’ while taking part in organic harvesting.

programme.title: Second Shot at Love
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed rational drinker who got diagnosed with alcohol dependency reunites with her alcohol-hating first love and takes on a sobriety challenge in this romance.

programme.title: Second Shot at Love
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed rational drinker who got diagnosed with alcohol dependency reunites with her alcohol-hating first love and takes on a sobriety challenge in this romance.

programme.title: Fresh off the Sea 2
programme.desc: <Fresh off the Sea> returns with Season 2! Lim Ji-yeon and Lee Jae-wook join the crew to hit Korea's coast and explore local delicacies unique to the area.

programme.title: The Killer's Shopping List
programme.desc: It tells the story of Ahn Dae-sung, a perceptive supermarket cashier with an impressive memory, and his girlfriend Do Ah-hee trying to fight against criminals by tracking their shopping lists.

programme.title: BRO&MARBLE in Dubai
programme.desc: Top celebrities come together to play a real-life “Blue Marble” game in Dubai with unexpected challenges! Who will survive in crisis and seize both friendship and money as the ultimate winning bro?

programme.title: Second Shot at Love
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed rational drinker who got diagnosed with alcohol dependency reunites with her alcohol-hating first love and takes on a sobriety challenge in this romance.

programme.title: Fresh off the Sea 2
programme.desc: <Fresh off the Sea> returns with Season 2! Lim Ji-yeon and Lee Jae-wook join the crew to hit Korea's coast and explore local delicacies unique to the area.

programme.title: Hashtag Travelog
programme.desc: CIX goes on ad-hoc trip to Hong Kong and Macao. As they arrive, they realize this is a “hashtag travelog”! Danny and Jordan also explore the cities of Guangzhou and Jiangmen by searching for the hashtags.

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim
programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim will teach you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes – from Italian pasta, Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!

programme.title: Europe Outside Your Tent: Norway
programme.desc: Yoo Hae-jin, Jin Seon-kyu, Yoon Kyun-sang ,and Park Ji-hwan reunited for a new journey, this time on a Winter camp in Norway, to fulfill their life dream of sighting the Northern Lights.

programme.title: World Dice Tour 3
programme.desc: A single dice roll sends our cast members on a wild ride around the globe. Prepare for jaw-dropping twists on the revamped game board and an epic scale that transforms every destination into a theme park!

programme.title: Second Shot at Love
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed rational drinker who got diagnosed with alcohol dependency reunites with her alcohol-hating first love and takes on a sobriety challenge in this romance.

programme.title: The Killer's Shopping List
programme.desc: It tells the story of Ahn Dae-sung, a perceptive supermarket cashier with an impressive memory, and his girlfriend Do Ah-hee trying to fight against criminals by tracking their shopping lists.

programme.title: King of Karaoke: VS
programme.desc: “VS,” which stands for “Vocal” and “Showdown,” is a survival show where participants showcase their singing abilities and compete against each other through karaoke to win a grand prize of 100 million won.

programme.title: GBRB: reap what you sow
programme.desc: Actors Lee Kwang-soo, Kim Woo-bin, Doh Kyung-soo and Kim Ki-bang, who are best friends in real life, experiencing and enjoying rural life in a remote ‘FARM’ while taking part in organic harvesting.

programme.title: The Changeover
programme.desc: Based on the Carnegie Medal-winning novel by Margeret Mahy, this film follows sixteen-year-old New Zealander Laura, who lives in a low-rent suburb with her mother and four-year-old brother, Jacko. When an ancient spirit attacks Jacko and slowly draws the life out of him, Laura discovers her true identity and the supernatural ability within her, and must harness it to save her brother’s life.

programme.title: New Fist Of Fury
programme.desc: A fighter helps a woman protect her martial-arts school in World War II Taiwan.

programme.title: The Hunter's Prayer
programme.desc: An assassin is sent to kill a young woman but finds himself unable to pull the trigger. They form an uneasy alliance and flee from their pursuers.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: Based on a true story about the struggles of a police detective to stop a turf war and maintain the peace and order in his district

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: An untested American submarine captain teams with U.S. Navy Seals to rescue the Russian president, who gets kidnap by a rogue general, to avoid an all-out war

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school student suffering from severe motion sickness has to walk two hours to school every day. When a teacher learns of her plight, she signs her up for a race walking team.

programme.title: From A House On Willow Street
programme.desc: After a young woman is kidnapped, her captors soon come to realize that in fact they may be the ones in danger and this young woman has a dark secret inside her.

programme.title: Hot Blooded
programme.desc: A veteran gangster looking to retire from a life of crime in the violent port town of Kuam, Korea unexpectedly gets caught in the middle of a mob war with bloody consequences.

programme.title: Sworn Brothers
programme.desc: Two step-brothers are on opposite sides of the law as triad and cop

programme.title: London Has Fallen
programme.desc: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.

programme.title: Legendary Amazons
programme.desc: In early 11th century China, the Song Dynasty is being invaded by armies of the rival state Western Xia. Yang, the last of a long line of Song generals, is killed and his widowed wife Mu leads other widows into battle to save their dynasty.

programme.title: The Goblin
programme.desc: Former gangster Doo-hyun, known as "Goblin", served time for his boss' murder to protect Young-min. Out of prison, Young-min kidnaps Doo-hyun's daughter, forcing him to seek vengeance and reclaim his "Goblin" persona.

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed 4
programme.desc: An underground fighter fights brutal matches to protect the widow of a man he unintentionally killed in the ring.

programme.title: Destination Myanmar
programme.desc: Destination Myanmar will take the audience to some of Myanmar's most beautiful and stunning Asian Heritage wetlands with fishermen paddling one-legged along shallow waters and floating gardens.

programme.title: The Codebreaker Who Hacked Hitler
programme.desc: Gordon Welchman was a British codebreaker who played a crucial role in undermining Nazi communications in WWII. Discover how Welchman’s top-secret work has impacted modern surveillance and codebreaking.

programme.title: The Spy In The Hanoi Hilton
programme.desc: We bring together the highest-ranking POWs from the infamous “Hanoi Hilton” prison camp to reveal harrowing tales of torture, interrogation and brutal treatment. In the midst of this hellish existence, a handful of POWs created a clandestine movement that eventually led to major rescue attempts and a spy ring whose top secret connections can only now be revealed.

programme.title: The Presidents
programme.desc: Explore Bill Clinton's complex legacy, from Arkansas roots to White House highs (economic prosperity) and lows (scandals, impeachment), and his impact on American politics.

programme.title: Sports Detectives
programme.desc: Wilt Chamberlain is the only NBA player to have scored a remarkable 100 points in a game. Investigate what happened to his 100-point ball. Then, examine a controversial Kentucky Derby trophy that may have been falsely identified.

programme.title: Sports Detectives
programme.desc: A young Muhammad Ali clinched Olympic gold in 1960, but returned home to the same bigotry he’d left behind. Disillusioned, it’s said that he threw his medal into the Ohio River. Head to Kentucky and uncover the real story behind this legendary tale.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali: The Greatest
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali, the greatest fighter ever, remains a global icon. His name still commands respect. Hear from those who knew him, relive his legendary fights, and explore the life of boxing’s greatest symbol.

programme.title: The Rock: Moving Mountains
programme.desc: Whether it’s the money or the muscles, you don’t mess with The Rock! Wrestling star turned Hollywood megastar carved himself a path to becoming king of the entertainment industry and brings his one of a kind charisma, charm and signature smile to everything he touches.

programme.title: Manny Pacquiao: Unstoppable Force
programme.desc: This is the remarkable journey of one of boxing’s most unstoppable forces. Manny Pacquiao’s legacy will forever be remembered for the change accomplished inside and outside the ring…

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids take a shortcut to the boat bound for the Forbidden City, and are waylaid by a tricky monkey. Zhizhu informs Mayor Li of some distressing sounds coming from the Wellspring.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D’Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D’Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.desc: The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Odlulu wants to get off the naughty list so she goes around the world and tries to "help" celebrations. Unfortunately she does the opposite which means Waldo and Wenda need to clean up her mess to reinstate Christmas!

programme.desc: Permission Impossible When Ra's parents refuse to let him go on the school camping trip, he sneaks away and gets lost in the Scary Woods with Casper and Mantha. What Possessed You? When a lesson in taking possession of a human body goes awry, Casper's human ends up taking possession of him!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The banner for Revs' Air show has disappeared. Where can it be ? Could someone be trying to spoil Revs' show? Noddy investigates.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused, they only come because there are worried about their friend. What is Raa Raa to do when he gets into trouble and nobody comes to his rescue?

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess thinks that Little Bird has dropped a feather as a gift for him to keep and play with so he's very worried when it goes missing. He searches for it and finally he finds it, right in Little Bird's nest, keeping her warm.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is having a sleepover and wants to wish on a star with the puppies like Willow has told them to. But they all fall asleep. When he wakes in the morning to find the stars are gone he has to work out why and when they'll be back

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesn’t love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.desc: Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didn’t go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!

programme.desc: The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! programme.title: Team Zenko Go

programme.desc: When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.desc: Abigail puts herself at risk to reunite an orphaned otter with his family. But the school veterinarian insists the animal will be safer at the zoo.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Branch must learn the importance of patience when Poppy teaches him "hair-jitsu"/Smidge tones down her forceful Smidge-ness when she forms a crush on the village critter-narian

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesn’t love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: When Sam Whippet asks Tag to help fill every seat in the Speedway for his big race, Tag zips around Pawston seeking out dogs. But it won’t be easy, as it happens to be a very busy day in town. A very distracted Beans makes Tag’s task even harder. / When pup-star Kelly Korgi announces a contest where she’ll pick her favorite Roadside Attraction to star in her new music video, Tag and Scooch are excited to enter Pawston. Now they just have to build one. And they have to do it fast.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Ari moves in to Harmony Harbor, but notices something strange involving a group of kids, a Noodle Truck chef and her pet squirrel. / After Ari discovers the secret of Team Zenko Go, he asks to join the crew. But first he must learn the importance of teamwork.

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: My Only One
programme.desc: A woman's life gets twisted one day because of her biological father who shows up after 28 years of absence. He had been thoroughly hiding his identity, afraid that he might be an obstacle in his daughter's life. The father and daughter meet the "only ones" in their lives and put back together the pieces of their broken hearts.

programme.title: Enter the Girl Dragon
programme.desc: A big fan of Bruce Lee, Pooja practises jeet kune do to become a skilled martial artist. She is so obsessed with Bruce Lee’s wisdom and martial arts technique that she loves him more than her boyfriend, Neel. However, when Neel is kidnapped by the mafia, she must fight them to save him.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Rough Cut
programme.desc: Actor Soo Ta plays the role of a gangster in his new movie and injures his co-star. Desperate to find a replacement, he invites a real gangster Gang Pae to complete the shooting. Gang Pae wants to be an actor and happily accepts it, but with the conditions that all fight scenes are to be shot with real weapons and no stuntman for Soo Ta is allowed!

programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then…

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy visits two culinary powerhouses who are bringing the flavors of their native countries to the places they now call home. First, he's off to Natraliart, serving up a taste of Jamaican paradise.

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics
programme.desc: Chefs are revamping comfort foods and cranking them up to a new level of feel-good fun. A sweet grilled cheese sandwich for dessert, chicken pot pie that elevates these classics to new heights!

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Mahal
programme.desc: Lira (Kylie Verzosa), a prize-winning author, spends a week to finish her final novel. But when she meets Andrei (Zanjoe Marudo), a young documentarist, her plans start to change.

programme.title: Working Boys 2: Choose Your Papa
programme.desc: About the bums who need to strategize in life, the roles of the three are sloppy every time they strategize. All three are natural comics so they are very natural in their roles.

programme.title: Sanggano, Sanggago't Sanggwapo
programme.desc: Three troublesome friends learns that one of them is actually rich when his father passes away and leaves him a hacienda.

programme.title: Ikaw na Sana
programme.desc: Blanca (Angelu de Leon) is a bubbly young woman with a positive view on life, but on the night she turns eighteen, a curse comes true and and destroys her face and dreams.

programme.title: The Barker
programme.desc: Coco (Empoy Marquez), is a simple jeepney barker who falls in love with Bella (Sky Carlos). Desperate to prove himself to Bella's family, Coco puts his life on the line to save them from kidnappers.

programme.title: Instant Daddy
programme.desc: Valentin Roxas (Jerald Napoles) raises a baby left behind in his cab as his own daughter. But his life takes a sharp turn when the birth mother resurfaces.

programme.title: Bahay na Pula
programme.desc: Jane (Julia Barretto) and her husband come home to an old ancestral house she inherited from her grandma. As days go by, they realize something evil is living with them in the house.

programme.title: Mañanita
programme.desc: An ex-military sniper who was honorably discharged accepts a mission that will indefinitely change her life in the attempts to make ends meet.

programme.title: Of All The Things
programme.desc: Already falling for each other, Berns starts maneuvering things to help Umboy retake the bar exams as he battles his fears to reclaim his self-esteem.

programme.title: General Emilio Aguinaldo
programme.desc: General Emilio Aguinaldo is a three-hour epic chronicling his political rise, his rivalries and his struggle against the Spanish and American colonizers. It aims to present a comprehensive narration of his life, achievements and even some controversial issues about him.

programme.title: Baler
programme.desc: Baler is primarily a love story between Feliza, the daughter of a rebel commander (Anne Curtis), and Celso, a half-Spanish soldier (Jericho Rosales), set at the twilight years of the Spanish regime in the Philippines.

programme.title: Ang Panday
programme.desc: A young blacksmith realizes his destiny when a malevolent demon bent on ruling the world unleashes an army of creatures on humanity.

programme.title: I Dream Of Jeannie S4 E03 - Tomorrow Is Not Another Day
programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: Bewitched S4 E03 - Business, Italian Style
programme.desc: Samantha’s coronation as Queen of the Witches launches the Stephens family into another year of supernatural antics as they learn to cope with their young daughter’s developing magical powers.

programme.title: CSI S4 E17 - XX
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: ALF S2 E06 - Some Enchanted Evening
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: Frasier S6 E03 - Dial M for Martin
programme.desc: In the sixth season of FRASIER, Frasier finally begins to believe that his life is going smoothly, for once. The rug is soon pulled out from under him when the radio station changes its format to a salsa -- leaving him without a job.

programme.title: The Waltons S2 E10 - The Thanksgiving Story (Part 1)
programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: ALF S2 E07 - Oh Pretty Woman
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: Frasier S6 E04 - Hot Ticket
programme.desc: In the sixth season of FRASIER, Frasier finally begins to believe that his life is going smoothly, for once. The rug is soon pulled out from under him when the radio station changes its format to a salsa -- leaving him without a job.

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S4 E08 - East Winds
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: North And South Book I E07 - Episode 4 (Part 1)
programme.desc: 1842. Two West Point military academy cadets form a bond of friendship strong enough to survive the forces leading to the United States' Civil War--forces that will rip their country into North and South

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S14)
programme.desc: ‘Ancient Aliens’ follows investigators as they travel to sites where signs of alien life have been discovered. Here, Giorgio Tsoukalos reviews evidence of the existence of extraterrestrial beings.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: The Alaskan wilderness is known for mysterious disappearances, stories of strange creatures, and is a hotspot for UFO sightings. Could Alaska's mysteries be due to a presence that is not of this world?

programme.title: Alone: Frozen (S1)
programme.desc: The changing landscape presents unique challenges and new opportunities for the participants, as they try to maintain their weight.

programme.title: Alone (S11)
programme.desc: As the season begins to change, one participant is forced to take on a massive project. Meanwhile, a pack of wolves interrupts the tranquility of the Arctic night and spells trouble for one survivalist.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S11)
programme.desc: In Idaho, Kidd and Harry Youren hunt a bear that tore up their camp, but the chase leads them into a confrontation. In Alaska, Martha and Elli Tansy try to bring down a bull moose.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)
programme.desc: Tom packs a traditional muzzleloader on a winter deer hunt with Sean and Hank. Jake and Anika complete a successful elk hunt. Aron and Jen cut down dead trees that threaten to destroy their cabin.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: Confidence grows when irrefutable scientific evidence reports the Fellowship is closer than ever to the gold.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: Troy runs into big trouble in his favourite honey hole. Daniel chases a legendary gator known as The Pirate. Leron and Porkchop battle a voodoo curse and confront a zombie gator.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: After discovering new evidence of massive metallic objects buried beneath the Mesa, the team conducts an experiment at the Triangle that leads to one of the most shocking revelations on Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: Oo Na Sige Na
programme.desc: When their relationship was discovered, Shirley was made to choose between father and boyfriend,Bonggoy.

programme.title: Ober Da Bakod 2 (Da Treasure Adbentyur)
programme.desc: The Dineros and the Dayukdoks, were off on a treasure hunt where they met the crazy professor Hannibal, a forgetful ghost, a tribe of midgets, a troop of sexy women from the moon and other fantasy figures.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: This is the story of four women in the glamorous world of fashion, about their friendships, their loves, and their careers.

programme.title: Tag-Araw, Tag-Ulan
programme.desc: A woman who was running away from the pain of a broken love affair. A young man who was looking forward to a fun-filled summer and his first sex experience.

programme.title: Marami Ka Pang Kakaining Bigas
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia played a veteran cop who rose from the ranks and who survived by his wits. Joko Diaz, on the other hand, was a young graduate from the police academy who did everything by the book.

programme.title: Sambahin Mo Ang Katawan Ko
programme.desc: A mysterious girl descends on a fishing village and stirs up a storm by carrying on with two of the village's most coveted bachelors --- an engaged playboy and a rich seminarian.

programme.title: Vizconde Massacre 2
programme.desc: Carlo J. Caparas, master of the massacre film took another look at the Vizconde rape and murder case with this film.

programme.title: Friends in Love (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Set in the sprawling campus of Brent School in scenic Baguio City, young stars Sharon, William, Jackie Lou and Rowell played a game of romantic musical chairs in this heartwarming story. Opposites attract and they were all faced with the difficulty of adjusting to the differences in their personalities.

programme.title: Habang May Buhay
programme.desc: Pia found herself in the same predicament as her mother did years ago. During that time, Zeny gave up her true love to marry a man whom her parents preferred. This time around Pia was engaged to Jonathan although she was in love with Gary.

programme.title: Pita, Terror Ng Kalookan
programme.desc: Pita witnessed the murder of his favorite brother and vowed to take revenge. He did, and was jailed for his vendetta.

programme.title: Parañaque Bank Robbery
programme.desc: There was a robbery in the bank where Joselito Joseco was employed and having adapted the guts and bravery of his idol, he was able to save the loot and shoot down the robbers.

programme.title: I Love You 3X A Day
programme.desc: An English teacher's students always play tricks on him because of his carabao English. He meets and falls in love with a fellow teacher.

programme.title: Markadong Hudas
programme.desc: Daniel Braganza,a leading hatchetman of a crime syndicate.He was a killer totally bereft of conscience that he earned the nickname "Markadong Hudas".

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: KABUKI KOOL
programme.desc: Osome's Seven Roles is a tour de force where seven parts, male and female, young and old are played by a single onnagata actor. Our guest Nakamura Kazutaro will tell us all about it.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Science View
programme.desc: Science for our future. Cutting edge research, innovation and technology being created by Japanese scientists and engineers.

programme.title: NHK NEWS 7
programme.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers

programme.title: Dive in Tokyo
programme.desc: We hit the town around Shinjuku East Exit, one of Tokyo's vibrant hubs. It has roots as a lodging area, which later welcomed a train terminal and eventually became a business and entertainment center.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Takada Satoshi has won top prizes in two different international gelato competitions. He reflects on his journey so far and talks about the gelatos that wowed the judges in Italy.

programme.title: Tokyo Bay Tsukudani
programme.desc: Nori tsukudani, a popular topping in rice-loving Japan. Made with local nori from Tokyo Bay, it's a taste and tradition preserved for over 100 years.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: On a Snowy Night
programme.desc: We come across a tranquil, snow-covered Edo cityscape. But there's something in the air: the aroma of foods both sweet and savory that helped the townspeople keep warm in the winter.

programme.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: frozen food vending machines.

programme.desc: The Paw Patrol must rescue Cap'n Turbot and Francois' Grandma Tilly after she rides off on a Dolphin.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew use their construction skills to convert the super car wash and clean Farmer Zoe's sticky farm animals.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Builder Cove needs a post office! But when construction gets squirrely, it's up to the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help Swiper re-join with his duplicates and make it to Grandma's picnic. Dora and Boots help Bateo the Bat get to the baseball game in time to play.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: When Grandma loses her glasses, Baby becomes her guide for the day. It's up to Baby and William to save the Carnivore Cove Nautical Night Fair.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springs's highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he can't sit still!

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Sharkdog must go on a wild search around town to help Mia find her missing binky and get the baby back to sleep.

programme.title: Friends S6 1
programme.desc: Ross and Rachel wake up with hangovers – and married. Chandler and Monica don't get married, but he asks her if he can move in with her instead.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 07
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin take hacking to the next level as they uncover the best hacks for cooking pizza and cutting cake. Plus, they'll show why bread is a true All-Star, and teach you some hacks that every parent needs to know.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 8
programme.desc: The Impractical Jokers, Sal, Joe, Murr and Q meet after the show to talk about their favorite moments during the show not to mention the most uncomfortable, most embarrassing, most humiliating and most outrageous. It is a chance for the viewers to hear about all the behind the scenes mishaps and awkward scenes as well as see outtakes never seen before.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 13
programme.desc: Season Finale. All of Smallville comes together to view a meteor shower, Lex Luthor (guest star Michael Cudlitz “The Walking Dead”) makes his move.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 3
programme.desc: Jesse knows you don't strike it rich if you play it safe, so he gambles big on a risky bin. Then, Lori defies her husband Brandon and buys a questionable unit. Will her bold move lead to a dynasty or divorce? And later, lightning erupts when the buyers battle it out for a puzzle of parts they hope will add up to one smooth ride.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 4
programme.desc: Big money brings out fierce competition at a rare high-stakes RV auction. Then, the contents of a locker spill out at our bidders' feet, smashing several dangerous objects. Will it bring seven years of bad luck, or a 7-figure payday? And later, Jesse's experience with antiques makes him think treasures lie behind the iron curtain.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 4
programme.desc: When Raj is upset he's the only one of the four guys who's not in a relationship, Penny sets out to find the perfect date, introducing him to Emily, a girl he can actually talk to!

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 8
programme.desc: Put Thomas Edison to shame with 20 of the World's Smartest Inventions - from a bird feeder with a shocking high-voltage surprise, to a bowl made entirely of bacon, and a whacky way to grow bananas at home. With innovative commentary from our cast ofhilarious comedians, including Mike O'Gorman, Jared Logan and Judy Gold.

programme.title: East New York S1 15
programme.desc: When a body is found at the construction site of a new high-end housing development, the team races to find the killer amidst a contentious gentrification battle in the neighborhood.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 5
programme.desc: A deadly bin puts all the buyers on edge. It's a bad omen that casts a dark shadow over the day. As the day winds to a fever pitch, Brandon and Lori square off against Scott and Chrissy in a do or die bidding war that sends all strategy out the window. And later, our competitors uncover a high-tech find they think could worth thousands. But all that glitters may not be gold.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 6
programme.desc: Cash flies over a locker that reveals a high-ticket mystery item. Then, everyone digs deep to win an ATM, but when the dust settles will this thing be filled with big bucks or major regret? And later, the unlikeliest of duos team up with a strategy that leaves our buyers' heads spinning.

programme.title: East New York S1 16
programme.desc: When a string of luxury boutique robberies is tied to a crew out of East New York, the 7-4 discovers a connection to Haywood that could prove crucial to solving the case.

programme.title: Found S1 1
programme.desc: Public relations specialist Gabi Mosley and her crisis management team now make sure there is always someone looking out for the forgotten missing people.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 08
programme.desc: Our hosts find hacks for retrieving lost objects, separating egg yolks, and removing wallpaper stains. They'll also make duct tape an All-Star, find another use for walnuts, and show you how to hack your home while you're away.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 9
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr head to the Lone Star State in a special episode that proves even embarrassment is bigger in Texas. The city boys from New York whip up trouble teaching cowboy skills on a ranch, and forget their southern hospitality trying to sell western wear. And it's a real drag for tonight's loser at what is definitely his first rodeo.

programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.desc: Lorna Dunkley brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Stirred With Love
programme.desc: Stirred is the word as two top chefs, Federica Andrisani of FICO Hobart and Warren Mendes of Food Trail: South Africa join Adam to make food stirred with love.

programme.title: Heywire - Annie from Bombala, NSW
programme.desc: Heywire winner Annie juggles school life with shed life in Bombala; she's a roustabout and reckons she's got stronger sorting wool.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 17
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Lorna Dunkley.

programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole - Great Rubber Heist
programme.desc: Look around you. Rubber is everywhere now, but it wasn't always this way. Marc Fennell takes you deep into the Amazon jungle to unravel an elaborate botanical heist that changed the world.

programme.title: Dream Gardens - Mount Eliza, VIC
programme.desc: Artist Meredith Gaston and her husband Kevin Lindemann want a modern landscape to surround their house in Victoria's Mount Eliza. Instead, they have a neglected 40-year-old garden full of weeds and disease riddled trees.

programme.title: If You're Listening - RFK Jr v Fluoride

programme.title: Next Gen Agriculture - Future Farmers

programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole - Great Rubber Heist
programme.desc: Look around you. Rubber is everywhere now, but it wasn't always this way. Marc Fennell takes you deep into the Amazon jungle to unravel an elaborate botanical heist that changed the world.

programme.title: Dream Gardens - Mount Eliza, VIC
programme.desc: Artist Meredith Gaston and her husband Kevin Lindemann want a modern landscape to surround their house in Victoria's Mount Eliza. Instead, they have a neglected 40-year-old garden full of weeds and disease riddled trees.

programme.title: Four Corners - Episode 19
programme.desc: Four Corners is the home of Australian investigative journalism. These fearless and forensic documentaries expose scandals, trigger inquiries, fire debate and confront taboos.

programme.title: Media Watch - Episode 18
programme.desc: It's the show everybody loves until they're on it. Sitting in the hot seat is new host Linton Besser, a four-time Walkley award-winning investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent.

programme.title: Planet America - Episode 19
programme.desc: High-stakes diplomacy as Donald Trump prepares to face up to world leaders at the G7 Summit in Canada, with tariffs and global trade high on the agenda. Plus the countdown to Trump's birthday and a possible military parade.

programme.title: The World - Episode 91
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 117
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 117
programme.desc: When you need to know what's going on this morning, turn to Meredith Sheehan for up to the minute news and events as they unfold. Plus the latest in politics, business, sport with Catherine Murphy and weather with Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 117
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Be My Guest
programme.desc: Adam's guests, chef Massimo Mele and athlete Isis Holt, lend a hand for Easy Entertaining, where the message is simple: be my guest!

programme.title: How Deadly World - Five Impressively Dangerous Wild Land Animals
programme.desc: Nature nerd, Dr Ann Jones, explains the sometimes terrifying and often hilarious behaviour of deadly wild animals from around the world.

programme.title: Extraordinary Animals - Episode 3
programme.desc: The benefits to being social can far outweigh any desire for peace and quiet - exploring the importance of shared knowledge and group dynamics, these seemingly anti-social animals all benefit from having 'mates'

programme.title: How Deadly - The Truth About Magpies In Australia
programme.desc: The magpie - the bird that divides Australia. For some, they're a dive-bombing nightmare and others, sweet backyard singers. Nature nerd Ann Jones breaks down these majestic creatures: there's more than meets the eye.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo - Bay of Fires, Fremantle, Healesville
programme.desc: Rae sets out on foot to traverse Tasmania's Bay of Fires, Ernie catches up with the founder of Freo's famed cappuccino strip and Narelda meets a Sapphire empowering Aboriginal youth.

programme.title: This Place - Bulgandry Aboriginal Art Site, Kariong
programme.desc: Gomeroi man, Gavi Duncan talks about Bulgandry. An art site at Kariong on the New South Wales Central Coast. Situated in the Brisbane Water National Park, it is home to centuries-old carvings depicting the story of Baiyami.

programme.title: Planet America - Episode 19
programme.desc: High-stakes diplomacy as Donald Trump prepares to face up to world leaders at the G7 Summit in Canada, with tariffs and global trade high on the agenda. Plus the countdown to Trump's birthday and a possible military parade.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 99
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: A typical married couple a little bored with their relationship come to discover that they are enemy assassins hired to kill each other.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

programme.title: Under Fire
programme.desc: Three journalists in a romantic triangle are involved in political intrigue during the last days of the corrupt Somoza regime in Nicaragua before it falls to a popular revolution in 1979.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death, who takes the form of a young man killed in an accident, asks a media mogul to act as his guide to teach him about life on Earth and, in the process, he falls in love with the mogul's daughter.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

programme.title: Under Fire
programme.desc: Three journalists in a romantic triangle are involved in political intrigue during the last days of the corrupt Somoza regime in Nicaragua before it falls to a popular revolution in 1979.

programme.title: The Italian Job (2003)
programme.desc: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: A tired American ex-boxer returns to his native hamlet in Ireland to win the hand of a spirited young woman. He is confronted by strict local customs and the woman's belligerent brother. Set in the verdant Irish countryside, this lively film has beautiful scenery, brilliant repartee, and local charm.

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: Wang Fam
programme.desc: Boo is a human marrying an aswang, Malou, to save her life, but he soon turns into an aswang as well to escape the pursue of other aswangs. After having three children, Boo and Malou decide to start a more normal and less monstrous family life in Manila. Can they start anew?

programme.title: 7ujuh
programme.desc: 7 friends go on a road trip to a remote bungalow run by a village head and his daughter Suri. They host a party and ask Suri to help. Things spiral out of control and Suri is raped. Before killing herself, she curses them to be haunted in their dreams. As the friends are killed off one by one, they must break the curse to escape their deadly fate.

programme.title: Bunshinsaba: Hoichi the Earless
programme.desc: You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: Central Park
programme.desc: A group of teenagers hang out for a night of fun in Central Park, but encounters a revenge-seeking killer who plans to kill them off one by one to pay for the sins of one of their fathers.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: 7ujuh

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)
programme.desc: The spirit of a departed child leaves its handprint on a couple's mirror. A ghost takes control of a willing paranormal investigator's neck. A woman spots what appears to be a mermaid in a local lake.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)
programme.desc: A millionaire widower and her teenage daughter take a five-star cruise together, but a grisly discovery is made when crew members find the widower's body crammed into her suitcase.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A Florida woman hides in her bathroom when a strange man breaks into her home in the middle of the night. A man trapped in his overturned truck calls 911 in a panic as the vehicle fills with icy water.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Reselling scrap junk became very hard as the market for scrap metal pays much less and so Andy had talked his mother into getting a reverse mortgage on the property.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a customer attacks fast food workers over her slushy order; a judge has no mercy for a corrupt sheriff; a suspended driver shows up for virtual court.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: An emotional courtroom hears the sentencing of a man convicted of killing his brother-in-law; a man charged with drug possession claims to be an undercover government agent.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: Detectives interrogate a woman accused of killing a lottery winner for his $30,000,000 prize; special agents press an ex-con about a missing 5-year-old girl and her dead babysitter; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A 92-year-old woman tells investigators why she shot and killed her 72-year-old son; a detective tells a suspect that the man he’s accused of stabbing has died at the hospital; and more.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: Evidence leads detectives in Mobile to believe that a victim was murdered by two gunmen. But the trial leaves the jury wrestling with the question of whether one of the suspects could be found not guilty.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: When a Tulsa man is killed by a bullet to the head, detectives discover guns hidden in the garage next door. The neighbor's role becomes a question in a case of cousin against cousin.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. An accused shoplifter launches an expletive-filled freak-out during his virtual bond hearing; a defendant gets tased after trying to escape; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A melee erupts as the gallery exits a murder trial hearing; a woman wanted on drug charges gets caught lying to the judge; and more.

programme.title: My Ghost Story Asia (S2)
programme.desc: After playing a demonic role, Malaysian actress Lavin Seow has a run-in with the supernatural; an uncle has to trap unfriendly spirits into a bottle before his niece would wake up from her coma.

programme.title: My Ghost Story Asia (S2)
programme.desc: Nine wandering spirits haunt a Singaporean family as they move into a new house; Karla Pambid from Philippines has a special gift - an ability to communicate with the unseen.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of combinatorics and probability.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the different techniques in writing, how to compose and critique it.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa malikhaing hakbang na nagsusulong ng pagtanggap at paggalang sa iba’t ibang kasarian upang maitaguyod ang pagkakapantay- pantay ng tao bilang kasapi ng pamayanan.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episode talk about the organisms as having feedback mechanisms and how these feedback mechanisms help the organism maintain homeostasis. These also explain how information is stored in DNA, how changes in a DNA molecule may cause changes in its products, how mutations that occur, and how evolution through natural selection can result in biodiversity. These also focus on the influence of biodiversity on the stability of ecosystems.

programme.title: Extracurricular
programme.desc: These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes feature the life of learners under alternative learning system. These episodes also focus on the process of pla ing, setting up, ru ing a small business, and these also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the concept of a family, school, and community. These also teach about letter names and sounds and different vocabularies about the environment.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino

programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 12
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 27
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 4
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?
